summary: A fading country music star (Keith) returns to his hometown, where he reunites with his childhood sweetheart and also meets his 16-year-old daughter for the first time.
cast: Brian F. Durkin|Jason Leith|Richard Tillman|Toby Keith|Leland L. Jones|Kelly Preston|Jeff Portell|Lindsey Haun|Greg Clarkson|Tess Harper|Burt Reynolds|Daniel Newman|Anna Maria Horsford|Sharon Blackwood|Josh Henderson|Steve Coulter|Bart Hansard|Scotty Emerick|Katie Finneran|Rhoda Griffis|Ron Clinton Smith|David Dwyer|David de Vries|Donna Biscoe|Seth Chalmers|Gracie Zane|Willie Nelson|Terrence Gibney|BeBe Winans|Johanna Braddy|George Anton|Hunt Baker|Christina Blizzard|Luanne Byrd|John Collier|Renee Crawford|J.C. James|AmyKathryn Jones|Merritt Mitchell|John Fitzgerald Page|April Rich|Brian Spencer|Steven Stadler|Mike Tallari|Joe Walsh|Steve Warren|Matt Wink|Kenneth L. Zirkman
title: Broken Bridges
